text:
Amazon Q is our
generative AI assistant

and it's really the most
capable AI assistant

with generative AI built in 
to interact with your data

or to put developers to work
and help them be more productive.
Amazon Q developers

really automates the entire
software development

life cycle from creating new code,
to testing it, to deploying it,

and then maintaining
and upgrading it in production.

And Amazon Q Business
allows you to connect

to over 40 different
data sources,

things like S3, Salesforce,
ServiceNow, Confluent,
allows you to define guardrails,

the same guardrails
that you use in Amazon Bedrock,

and it makes it easy to customize
and build Q&A applications
that interact with that data.

And we've also made
Amazon Q available

in a number of
other services,

things like Amazon Connect for
customer service applications,

AWS Supply Chain for
optimizing your core business ops,
and then in Amazon QuickSight

for generative interaction
with business data.
And it's really about

making it easy to build
generative AI capabilities
into customer apps.
